languages.text: {n}Историк шумно вздыхает.{/n} "Простите. Я должен в первую очередь благодарить вас. За то, что выслушали, а потом решили загадку, а потом — нашли время рассказать мне. Теперь я чувствую, что все было не зря".

{n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "I'm sorry. I should be thanking you first and foremost. For listening to me, and then solving the puzzle, and then finding the time to tell me. Now I finally feel like it hasn't all been for nothing."
languages.original_text: {n}Историк шумно вздыхает.{/n} "Простите. Я должен в первую очередь благодарить вас. За то, что выслушали, а потом решили загадку, а потом — нашли время рассказать мне. Теперь я чувствую, что все было не зря".

{n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "I'm sorry. I should be thanking you first and foremost. For listening to me, and then solving the puzzle, and then finding the time to tell me. Now I finally feel like it hasn't all been for nothing."

languages.text: {n}彼は深呼吸をした。{/n}「すみません。まずあなたに感謝をすべきでしたね。私の話に耳を傾け、謎を解き、そしてわざわざ私に報告する時間を割いていただきありがとうございます。今ようやく、すべてが無駄ではなかったと思えるようになりました」
languages.original_text: {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "I'm sorry. I should be thanking you first and foremost. For listening to me, and then solving the puzzle, and then finding the time to tell me. Now I finally feel like it hasn't all been for nothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は深呼吸をした。{/n}「すみません。まずあなたに感謝をすべきでしたね。私の話に耳を傾け、謎を解き、そしてわざわざ私に報告する時間を割いていただきありがとうございます。今ようやく、すべてが無駄ではなかったと思えるようになりました」

languages.text: {n}他深深地吸了一口气。{/n}“抱歉，我最应该感谢的人是您。是您听了我的倾诉，解开了谜题，还抽出时间来告诉我。现在，我终于觉得，这一切并非徒劳。”
languages.original_text: {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "I'm sorry. I should be thanking you first and foremost. For listening to me, and then solving the puzzle, and then finding the time to tell me. Now I finally feel like it hasn't all been for nothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}他深深地吸了一口气。{/n}“抱歉，我最应该感谢的人是您。是您听了我的倾诉，解开了谜题，还抽出时间来告诉我。现在，我终于觉得，这一切并非徒劳。”

languages.text: {n}Respira hondo.{/n} «Mis disculpas. Ante todo, debería agradecerle que me haya escuchado, resuelto el acertijo y encontrado el tiempo para decírmelo. Ahora por fin siento que no todo ha sido en vano».
languages.original_text: {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "I'm sorry. I should be thanking you first and foremost. For listening to me, and then solving the puzzle, and then finding the time to tell me. Now I finally feel like it hasn't all been for nothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Respira hondo.{/n} «Mis disculpas. Ante todo, debería agradecerle que me haya escuchado, resuelto el acertijo y encontrado el tiempo para decírmelo. Ahora por fin siento que no todo ha sido en vano».

languages.text: {n}Il prend une profonde inspiration.{/n} « Excusez-moi. Je devrais avant tout vous remercier de m'avoir écouté, d'avoir résolu cette énigme et même d'avoir pris le temps de revenir me le dire. Grâce à vous, j'ai enfin le sentiment que tout ceci n'aura pas été vain. »
languages.original_text: {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "I'm sorry. I should be thanking you first and foremost. For listening to me, and then solving the puzzle, and then finding the time to tell me. Now I finally feel like it hasn't all been for nothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il prend une profonde inspiration.{/n} « Excusez-moi. Je devrais avant tout vous remercier de m'avoir écouté, d'avoir résolu cette énigme et même d'avoir pris le temps de revenir me le dire. Grâce à vous, j'ai enfin le sentiment que tout ceci n'aura pas été vain. »

languages.text: {n}Er atmet tief durch.{/n} "Verzeiht. Ich sollte zunächst einmal Euch danken. Ihr habt mir zugehört, das Rätsel gelöst und dann noch die Zeit gefunden, mich zu informieren. Jetzt habe ich endlich das Gefühl, dass nicht alles umsonst war."
languages.original_text: {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "I'm sorry. I should be thanking you first and foremost. For listening to me, and then solving the puzzle, and then finding the time to tell me. Now I finally feel like it hasn't all been for nothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er atmet tief durch.{/n} "Verzeiht. Ich sollte zunächst einmal Euch danken. Ihr habt mir zugehört, das Rätsel gelöst und dann noch die Zeit gefunden, mich zu informieren. Jetzt habe ich endlich das Gefühl, dass nicht alles umsonst war."

languages.text: {n}Derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Affedersiniz. Evvela size teşekkür etmeliydim. Bana kulak verdiniz, sonra kalkıp bulmacayı çözdünüz, hatta bir de vakit ayırıp bana anlattınız. Nihayet tüm bunların yok yere olmadığını hissediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}He takes a deep breath.{/n} "I'm sorry. I should be thanking you first and foremost. For listening to me, and then solving the puzzle, and then finding the time to tell me. Now I finally feel like it hasn't all been for nothing."

traits.locale_text: {n}Derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm. Öncelikle size teşekkür etmeliyim. Beni dinlediniz, sonra kalkıp bulmacayı çözdünüz, hatta bir de vakit ayırıp bana anlattınız. Nihayet tüm bunların bir anlamı varmış gibi hissediyorum."
